text: Isadore "Friz" Freleng (August 21, 1905May 26, 1995), credited as I. Freleng early in his career, was an American cartoonist. He was known for introducing characters such as Bugs Bunny, Porky Pig, Tweety, Sylvester the Cat, Yosemite Sam, and Speedy Gonzales. == Notes == == References == Category:1906 births Category:1995 deaths Category:American movie producers Category:Jewish American writers Category:People from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Screenwriters from Missouri
title: Friz Freleng
